name: Come With the Flow
description:
Come With the Flow is a game prototype about travelling by following Non-Player Character into their world.

Switch between flows and loop to explore this environement.

HOW TO PLAY :

Strongly recomended with xbox360 controller :

  • Hold "A" to switch NPC.
  • Use "Left stick" to move the cursor.

On keyboard (not recomended):

  • Hold "V" to switch NPC.
  • Use "Arrow keys" to move cursor.
